entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
